  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(boolean freePassage, Supplier<MenuBase> content, Baggable[] stock)
      Parameters:
      freePassage - indicates if room is free - not locked, doesn't have any combat or important plot twist
      content -

      a fabric method to create room's content, which will initiate new menu with content

      • nullable (if room is empty or just contains some treasures)
      • is invoked after first render of room
      stock - items that are saved in room. Can't be null

    • saveResources

      public void saveResources(Baggable[] stock)
      rewrites room's stock
      Parameters:
      stock - items that must be saved in room
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if stock is null
